On Apr 14, 2010, at 8:09 PM, Will Hartung wrote:

> I would argue about REST being simpler.

To clarify: I was referring to the simplicity induced into the resulting system, not to the simplicity of the task of creating the system.

(Though I think that the process of system creation is actually also simpler with REST - once you grok it...)

Jan
